mapper.select:
select
from( select ,ROWNUM rn from HZ_CMCR_DETAIL_AFTER_CHANGE t WHERE t.CMCR_DETAIL_SRC_PUID in
#{hzCmcrDetailChange.cmcrDetailSrcPuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and t.CMCR_DETAIL_CG_VWO_ID <= #{vwoid,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY t.CMCR_DETAIL_CG_ID DESC ) te where te.rn <= #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by te.CMCR_DETAIL_CG_ID

select ,t2.p_color_code as colorCode from HZ_CMCR_DETAIL_AFTER_CHANGE t LEFT JOIN Hz_cfg0_colorset t2 ON t.cmcr_detail_src_color_uid = t2.puid where CMCR_DETAIL_CG_VWO_ID = (select max(CMCR_DETAIL_CG_VWO_ID) from HZ_CMCR_DETAIL_AFTER_CHANGE where CMCR_DETAIL_CG_VWO_ID<#{vwoId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

select ,t2.p_color_code as colorCode from( select
from HZ_CMCR_DETAIL_AFTER_CHANGE where CMCR_DETAIL_CG_VWO_ID = #{vwoId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and CMCR_DETAIL_SRC_CFG_UID is not NULL ) t LEFT JOIN Hz_cfg0_colorset t2 ON t.cmcr_detail_src_color_uid = t2.puid
